bibl.title: Letter from Pedro Nogueira to Philip Showalter Hench, February 24, 1954

div1.p: Nogueira orders a medal for Cooke's widow and wonders if the Walter Reed Memorial Association will pay for it.

div1.head: Letter from Pedro Nogueira to Philip Showalter Hench, February 24, 1954
div1.opener:
DR. PEDRO NOGUEIRA
MEDICO CIRUJANO
MARTI 219, MARIANAO
-----
TELEFONO: B0-7577
Marianao Fehrero 24 of 1954
Dr Philip Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnessota
U. S. A.
Dear Philip:
div1.p:
Thank you, very much sincerily, your help to resolve the
matter of Condecorations pending delivery for which I have received
Check from Dr Joseph F. Siler for the amount of $ 245.00.- He includ-
des on the list the following persons:

W. L. Reed; General Truby; Mrs Blossom Reed; Houston Lazear; Mrs
W.D Lazear Briggs; James Carroll and Hanberry.-

May be you forgot to include Robert Cooke, who was condecorated
too, on Post-Mortum, as you will remember, about which I talked
you by phone, the nigth before, you started from Havana, on your
last trip.

Anyhow, I ordered to make the medal, for mailing it, to his widow
and we hope to decide the way for paying the amount, if Walter Reed
Memorial Assoc, dont do it, like on previous cases indicated.

I trust in any way to have your answer, or that of Dr Siler, whom
I wrote too, a copy of which I am mailing together.

On the other hand I must tell you, that up to now, Science Academy
has not held meeting, to treat about our petition, that we presented
personaly Dr Clemente Inclan, its President. Beside Dr Inclan, as Rec
tor of Havana University has had some troubles, relationed with
the same and that, has prevented him, from attending the Academy
the time necessary, as I understand. However as soon as the Academy
meets, I expect to attend its session, and then I will let you know
inmediatily.

You dont forget to send your notes on relations Lazear
Camp, and for me, at having the medals, I will inform you, through
American Embassy all that we do, for reaching at their places.
div1.closer:
Finnally, waiting your pleasant notice and best wishes
and greeting you: Pedro.
Pedro P.D.- The medals will be finish on March 15 and the exactly price
is $ 34.00 each; on others words I need only $ 27.00 for the
medal to Cooke, because I have 7.00 dollars for the diference
in the cost of others medals.
Pedro.
Pedro
